column20: Charged Attack: Perform up to 5 rapid strikes.
column21: Plunging Attack: Consumes a certain amount of Stamina to unleash 2 rapid sword strikes.
column167: Press: #Bennett puts all his fire and passion for adventuring into his sword. Results may vary based on how fired up he is...
column168: Hold (Short): A single, swift flame strike that deals Pyro DMG.
column346: Rekindle: Decreases Passion Overload's CD by 20%.
column347: Fearnaught: Within the area created by Fantastic Voyage, Passion Overload takes on the following effects: • CD is reduced by 50%. • Bennett will not be launched by the effects of Charge Level 2.
column348: Grand Expectation: Fantastic Voyage's ATK increase no longer has an HP restriction, and gains an additional 20% of Bennett's Base ATK.
column349: Impasse Conqueror: When Bennett's HP falls below 70%, his Energy Recharge is increased by 30%.
column350: Unstoppable Fervor: Increases the Level of Passion Overload by 3. Maximum upgrade level is 15.
column351: Unexpected Odyssey: Using a Normal Attack when executing the second attack of Passion Overload's Charge Level 1 allows an additional attack to be performed. This additional attack does 135% of the second attack's DMG.
column352: True Explorer: Increases the Level of Fantastic Voyage by 3. Maximum upgrade level is 15.
column353: Fire Ventures with Me: Sword, Claymore, or Polearm-wielding characters inside Fantastic Voyage's radius gain a 15% Pyro DMG Bonus and their weapons are infused with Pyro.
